item.title: How’s It Playing? POTUS Wants to Know.

item.title: Israel Suggests It Could Strike Iran Again to Counter New Threats
item.description: Israel’s defense minister said Israel would strike if Iran seeks to develop long-range missiles or advance its nuclear program, despite a truce.
